Alexis Ohanian

Alexis Ohanian

Founder, Reddit

After graduating from the University of Virginia in June 2005, Alexis Ohanian started reddit.com with Steve Huffman. In October of 2006, their company was acquired by CondÃ© Nast, where he is now a product manager. Along with managing product, he also doodles the reddit mascot. A social news website, reddit lets readers – not editors – decide what goes on the front page by simply voting content up or down. The model has proved popular thus far: over 4.6 million people visit Reddit each month.
